title: Google Photos: Edit, Organize, Search, and Backup Your Photos
text: Makes - editing - organization - search - photos feel like magic Discover new ways to create Got the perfect selfie? Remix it into different styles. Took an action pic? Bring it to life as a video. Had an epic trip? Make it a collage. Explore all these tools and more in the new Create tab.1 Get more from every memory AI-powered tools Edit, organize, search, and more. Enhance your photos, easily find the pics youâre looking for, and automatically organize them â all with the power of Google AI. Got an iPhoneÂ®?3 Weâve got you covered. GoogleÂ Photos works for you. You can sync your library and favorites during setup and your photos will automatically upload to the app. Search made simple Try Ask Photos today No more endless scrolling through your gallery. Ask Photos can helpâ¨you find exactly what youâre looking for, such as: - Finding specific things, like your license plate number - Pulling up certain photos and videos from your last trip - Getting help with tasks beyond search, like writing a social caption for a specific picture Edit your photos just by asking.7 Describe edits and watch them appear. Magic Eraser. Distractions are a distant memory. Photo Unblur. Go from blurry to breathtaking. Stroll down memory lane Easily revisit your favorite memories. With machine learning, your top shots are curated for you so you can share them with the people who made those moments special. Organized with the help of AI Your photos and documents are automatically organized, so you can spend more time enjoying your memories and less time arranging them. Automatically group similar photos together with PhotoÂ Stacks. Documents are sorted into albums, like screenshots, receipts, notes, and more. A safe home for your lifeâs memories Your data is yours Everything you add to GoogleÂ Photos belongs to you, and you can always delete or export your content. Your memories are safe We operate one of the most advanced security infrastructures to help keep your photos and videos safe. Your data isnât used in ads GoogleÂ Photos never sells your photos, videos, or personal information to anyone, and we don't use your photos and videos for advertising. Print your favorite pics Your moments become treasured keepsakes in just a few taps.5 Prints Turn your best memories into photo prints Photo books Relive lifeâs greatest stories â page by page Canvas prints Decorate your home with joyful moments The latest from Photos Frequently asked questions Every Google Account comes with 15 GB of storage for GoogleÂ Photos, Gmail, and Google Drive. You can also buy more storage with a Google One membership plan. Yes, GoogleÂ Photos works on both iOS and Android devices. Get the app to get started. You can also use it on Desktop and Tablet devices. Learn more about how GoogleÂ Photos integrates with your deviceâs default gallery. You can automatically save your photos and videos to your Google Account when you turn on backup. You can enable backup while setting up your Photos app or if you go to the Settings page and turn backup on. You can also manually backup your photos. Learn more about the benefits of backup. To edit photos on your mobile device, download and install the GoogleÂ Photos app. Editing features including Magic Eraser, and Photo Unblur are only available in the GoogleÂ Photos app. Learn more about how to edit your photos and videos. You can share photos, videos, albums, and highlight videos with any of your contacts, even if they don't use the GoogleÂ Photos app. Simply tap the âShareâ button and you can send photos directly to existing GoogleÂ Photos users or tap âShare toâ to share with your contacts, share in your everyday apps, create a shared album or create a direct link to that photo. Learn more about how to share your photos and videos. You can easily search your photos and videos for anything. For example, you can search by places youâve traveled, your pet, your favorite foods and more. To more easily search and manage your photos, you can apply a name to people or pets that appear in your photos. Learn more about Face Groups and how to search your photos.
